attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand an automatic 5 year prison sentence for all cases of serious animal cruelty.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/crueltyanimals/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
